entry.title: Versagel Standard M Lip Gloss Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: ABA Cosmetic Supply, LLC
Type:
Price: 7.00 - 245.00 (6 variants)

This is for the Versagel M with mineral oil as a main ingredient.

Don’t forget our super strength flavoring oils

Cruelty, Vegan, and Gluten free

WE OFFER 2 DIFFERENT VERSAGEL FORMULAS.  M SERIES CONTAINS COSMETIC GRADE FDA APPROVED GELLED MINERAL OIL.  THE ME SERIES HAS HYROGENATED POLYISBUTANE REPLACING THE MINERAL OIL

 

Our Lip Gloss base is a gel that is great for making lip gloss with. We have worked with amazing people to formulate a gloss base to what we wanted. After watching hundreds of videos and seeing how much oils were wasted by trying to find a thinner consistency, we knew we had to find a solution, which is exactly what we did. Our goal is to provide an amazing product at much more affordable prices.  If you have any questions, or want a size that is not listed, we can also can do custom orders.  As some will need more or less than others.  We also offer large quantities, which would go through our sales department.  Please email at info@abacosmeticsupply.com for further information or questions.  Please not that we leave extra space in our bags for expansion while in transits.  

All product is made in the USA.  We also use the same manufacture as TKB.

Please let us know if you have any questions.  

Ingredients: Versagel M (Standard)-Mineral Oil (and) Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer (and) Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer

Ingredients: Versaegl ME (Premium) Hydrogenated Polyisobutene (and) Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer (and) Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer

below is very  good information for anyone questioning why we use mineral oil 

Mineral oil is Clear, odorless oil derived from petroleum that is widely used in cosmetics. Despite mineral oil’s association with petroleum and the hype that it’s bad for or ages skin, keep in mind that petroleum is a natural ingredient derived from the earth. Once it’s purified to become mineral oil USP (cosmetics- and pharmaceutical-grade mineral oil), it has no resemblance to the original petroleum and isn’t a source of contaminants.

Cosmetics-grade mineral oil and petrolatum are considered the safest, most non-sensitizing moisturizing ingredients ever found. Mineral oil and petrolatum are known to be efficacious in skin replenishing and are also among the most effective, established moisturizing ingredients available. 

The mineral oil in skincare products is certified as either USP (United States Pharmacopeia) or BP (British Pharmacopeia). It’s completely safe, soothing, non-sensitizing, and perfectly beneficial for skin.

Mineral oil has no effect on the vitamin levels in your skin. ... In fact, in a study published in the Journal of CosmeticDermatology, cosmetic grade mineral oilwas found to be non-comedogenic (meaning it doesn't clog pores, which can lead to blackheads and acne

References for this information:

Toxicology Letters, October 2017, pages 70-78

International Journal of Cosmetic Science, 2012, issue 6, pages 511-518

International Journal of Cosmetic Science, 2007, issue 5, pages 385-390

European Journal of Ophthalmology, 2007, issue 2, pages 151-159

Food and Chemical Toxicology, February 1996, issue 2, pages 213-215

 

Versagel ME grades are gelled Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, a mineral oil-free alternative for labeling. Visually appealing, odorless and do not discolor with age. They are easier and safer to handle and formulate than gels that use metal stearates or fumed silica. They provide fragrance retention in skin care products and furnish waterproofing properties to sunscreen products. Furthermore, they are hydrophobic, thermally reversible and without syneresis (oil bleed).

  • Improves emulsion stability
  • Replacement for mineral oil in personal care formulations
  • Proven track record with gelled baby oil

Substantial effect on the Moisture, Plumpness, Lip Lines, Scaling, and Crackling of lips.

Ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene (and) Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer (and) Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer

entry.title: LNA Lip Gloss Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tipsy Glosses
Type:
Price: 6.30 - 245.00 (6 variants)

Cruelty, Vegan, and Gluten free

Our Versagel Lip Gloss is a gel that is great for making lip gloss with. We have worked with amazing people to formulate a gloss base to what we wanted. After watching hundreds of videos and seeing how much oils were wasted by trying to find a thinner consistency, we knew we had to find a solution.  Beings we had the manufacture add mineral oils you will not have to add near as much oils for a better consistency.   Our goal is to provide an amazing product at much more affordable prices.  If you have any questions, or want a size that is not listed, we can also can do custom orders.  As some will need more or less than others.  We also offer large quantities, which would go through our sales department.  Please info@abacosmeticsupply.com for further information in regards to mass amounts.  

All product is made in the USA.  We also use the same supplier as TKB.

Please let us know if you have any questions.

Weight is sold by volume not by mass
